author: oysteing
msg: DERBY-3428: Doing a replication failover should shutdown the database and the connection should no longer be available
The shutdown exception needs to be a StandardException in order to shut down the database (SQLException does not work)
After failove, unfreeze the database before trying shutdown.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-739] delete the -SNAPSHOT versions of new features from the "features" dir, to avoid making the uimaj-eclipse-update-site project marked as needing an SVN update, unless the non-snapshot version is being generated.

author: markh
msg: Switch off caching for Jar input stream URL connection to avoid Jar file locking
